```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
f <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-2021-datasets/main/KamilarAndCooperData.csv"
d <- read_csv(f, col_names = TRUE) 

s <- mutate(d, Binomial = paste(Genus, Species, sep = " ")) %>%
  select(Binomial,
         Family,
         Brain_size_species_mean,
         Body_mass_male_mean) %>%
  group_by(Family) %>%
  summarise(
    avgs = mean(Brain_size_species_mean, na.rm = TRUE),
    avgM = mean(Body_mass_male_mean, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  arrange()
s

```
